attributes.action: invade France, and hence provide us with a war we can all get behind.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Let's restore national pride and have a war we're sure to win and will be popular with everyone.

After we win, we can give it back and tell them we changed our mind and they're welcome to it.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
